name: BDateRangePicker
sample: <BDateRangePicker hintText='Hint Text'  floatingLabelText='Floating Label Text' onChange={myChangeEvent()} mode='potrait' container='dialog' errorText='Field is required' disabled=false firstDayOfWeek=1 autoOk=false okLabel='TAMAM' cancelLabel='Ä°PTAL' />

infoArray.name: value
infoArray.desc: error text for html input validation

infoArray.name: mode
infoArray.desc: tells the component to display the picker in portrait or landscape mode

infoArray.name: container
infoArray.desc: used to control how the BDatePicker will be displayed when the input field is focused

infoArray.name: firstDayOfWeek
infoArray.desc: used to change the first day of week

infoArray.name: autoOk
infoArray.desc: if true, automatically accept and close the picker on select a date

infoArray.name: okLabel
infoArray.desc: override the default text of the 'OK' button

infoArray.name: cancelLabel
infoArray.desc: override the default text of the 'CANCEL' button

infoArray.name: style
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the root element.

infoArray.name: textFieldStyle
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of DatePicker's TextField element.
